author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-2843: Fixed using setHeader with Groovy to not loose message details during routing. In fact this applies for all script languages.

author: kristwaa
msg: DERBY-4653: Avoid unnecessary round-trip for commit in the client driver
Removed unused argument and set autocommit to false in the test.
Patch contributed by Lily Wei (lilywei at yahoo dot com).

author: fmui

- made sure that content streams are getting closed so that network resources can be released
